RULESAuth.Message: Over 7 pam auth failure events in 10 minutes
RULESAuth.SQLQuery: SELECT Id FROM Auth WHERE DateStamp >= timestamp(date_sub(now(), interval 10 minute)) AND (Message LIKE "%fail%" AND Message LIKE "%pam%")

RULESAuth.Message: Over 2 pam auth failure events for root in 10 minutes
RULESAuth.SQLQuery: SELECT Id FROM Auth WHERE DateStamp >= timestamp(date_sub(now(), interval 10 minute)) AND (Message LIKE "%fail%" AND Message LIKE "%pam%" AND Message LIKE "%root%")

RULESVis7am.SQLQuery: SELECT Id FROM Visual WHERE DateStamp >= timestamp(date_sub(now(), interval 10 hour)) AND (Message LIKE "%PIR: Motion%")
